name: Neela's Lunch
description:
A homework for Quantum Games-course.

Made with Construct 3 in about 6 hours.

The game is about my baby girl Neela, who would rather feed our chihuahua Bamse than eat her food. (We really don't feed her steaks and broccoli, don't worry ;) )
You are Bamse and you want to eat all the steaks and avoid the broccoli. Bamse can be moved with the arrow keys. Steaks +1 to the score and broccolis -2.

The game is over when your score is under 0 or the time runs out. 

Have fun! 

Thanks to all wonderful people who let me use their stuff for free! :)
Background music:  https://freesound.org/s/512161/
Steak SFX: https://freesound.org/s/570336/
Broccoli SFX: https://freesound.org/s/135415/

Chihuahua: Chihuahua icons created by Freepik - Flaticon
Broccoli: Broccoli icons created by Icongeek26 - Flaticon
Steak: Meat icons created by Freepik - Flaticon
